values: The Second Coming: Not Before the ‘Man of Lawlessness’The Second Coming: Not Before the ‘Man of Lawlessness’

As we look forward to Christ’s second coming, what matters most is not that we have the timing and details down, but that we hold fast to Jesus as our great hope.As we look forward to Christ’s second coming, what matters most is not that we have the timing and details down, but that we hold fast to Jesus as our great hope.
